channel.title: Need some lag help!
channel.description: Alright so iv been working on this source, its coming out really great but one problem..its lags HARD... i think its the objects i added for training...if you think you can help post or add me on msn klorox@hotmail.com if you can help me fix it ill give you admin on the server when its finished ;D

item.title: Need some lag help!
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

change training from object to npcs, it reduces massing, with reduces lag. just change exp for monster hits, add npcs in autospawn, and remove exp from objects, then remove them.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some lag help!
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Hmm, mine is 950 kb and it doesnt lag. Sometimes certain objects can make the server lag like CRAZY! Delete all your added objects…seriously…Unless, if you dont know any java and dont know how to replace 'em if you need 'em, just delete the ones you dont need. Go onto the autospawn folder, delete the npcs you dont need. That’ll take a bunch of lag off.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some lag help!
item.dc:creator: @klorox klorox
item.description:
@klorox wrote:

Actully the client is rather small i belive its the global objects and iv got a 1.5mbs host and it lags him aswell theres just something wrong…i really got alot of posts quick ill check on it more often[br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2007, 04:34:23 PM[/size][hr]Client is only 930 KB[br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2007, 04:35:28 PM[/size][hr]Hmm, no luck with anything posted

Read full topic

item.title: Need some lag help!
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Man_Hunter Dead Man Hunter
item.description:
@Dead_Man_Hunter wrote:

And to figure how big it is…Here’s a simple way lol

Upload your client.java to www.uppit.com and click the link it will say client.java(###KB)

item.title: Need some lag help!
item.dc:creator: @Danny068 Danny068
item.description:
@Danny068 wrote:

Yeah, a good computer helps, but don’t go deleting anything in your client make sure you delete things you dont need.E.g rubbish commands are a start

item.title: Need some lag help!
item.dc:creator: @Noob_Slayerz Noob Slayerz
item.description:
@Noob_Slayerz wrote:

That could help.

Also, it may be your computer. I can’t host my server on my computer because it stinks.

Yea, it’s probably because your client.java is stuffed and you have way too much junk.

Read full topic
